md:
giải nghĩa từ "noodle" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Noodle (noun) - Mì, sợi mì
	+ Meaning: A long, thin piece of food made from flour, water, and sometimes egg, used in many Asian dishes.
	+ Example sentence: "I love eating noodles with my favorite sauce."
	+ Related words: rice noodle, egg noodle, instant noodle, noodle soup

* Noodle (verb) - Đánh đập, đùa nghịch
	+ Meaning: To play or fool around with someone or something in a gentle and playful way.
	+ Example sentence: "The kids were noodling around with the puppy in the backyard."
	+ Related words: mess around, fool around, play around, horse around
html:
giải nghĩa từ "noodle" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Noodle (noun) - Mì, sợi mì

    • Meaning: A long, thin piece of food made from flour, water, and sometimes egg, used in many Asian dishes.
    • Example sentence: "I love eating noodles with my favorite sauce."
    • Related words: rice noodle, egg noodle, instant noodle, noodle soup

  • Noodle (verb) - Đánh đập, đùa nghịch

    • Meaning: To play or fool around with someone or something in a gentle and playful way.
    • Example sentence: "The kids were noodling around with the puppy in the backyard."
    • Related words: mess around, fool around, play around, horse around
